TypeSignature.Value: .class public auto ansi sealed beforefieldinit DispatchOperation extends System.Object

summary.span: 用于修改或扩展服务终结点中的特定服务操作的执行行为。

span.span: Used to modify or extend the execution behavior of a specific service operation in a service endpoint.

summary.span: 无法继承此类。

span.span: This class cannot be inherited.

remarks.format: ## Remarks 类为仅一个服务操作范围内的自定义扩展的运行时修改和插入点的位置。The class is the location for run-time modifications and insertion point for custom extensions that are scoped to only one service operation. （若要修改协定中的所有消息的服务运行时行为，请使用 类。）(To modify service run-time behavior for all messages in a contract, use the class.) 通过使用自定义操作行为对象或更大范围内的行为安装 修改可以修改协定中的操作。Install modifications using a custom operation behavior object or a behavior at a larger scope in order to modify operations across a contract. 使用 属性可以查找表示特定服务操作的 对象。Use the property to locate the object that represents a particular service operation. - 、、、、 和 属性可获取该操作的各个值。The , , , , , and properties obtain the respective values for the operation. - 和 属性指可以定事务行为。The and properties specify transaction behavior. - 和 属性可以控制用户定义的服务对象的、相对于 的生存期。The and properties control the lifetime of the user-defined service object relative to the . - 使用 、 和 属性可以显式控制消息和对象之间的相互转换。The , , and the properties enable explicit control over the conversion from messages to objects and vice versa. - 属性指定操作模拟级别。The property specifies the operation impersonation level. - 属性插入操作的自定义调用上下文扩展。The property inserts custom call context extensions for the operation. 有关详细信息，请参阅 。For more information, see . - 属性控制当服务操作完成时是否释放参数对象。The property controls whether parameter objects are disposed when the service operation is completed. - 使用 属性可以插入自定义调用程序对象。The property to insert a custom invoker object. - 使用 属性可以插入自定义参数检查器，您可以使用该检查器来检查或修改参数以及返回值。The property enables you to insert a custom parameter inspector that you can use to inspect or modify parameters and return values.

summary.span: 初始化 类的新实例。

span.span: Initializes a new instance of the class.

span.span: Initializes a new instance of the class using the specified dispatch run-time, name, and action values.

remarks.format: ## Remarks 对遵循单向模式的服务操作使用此构造函数。Use this constructor for a service operation that follows the one-way pattern.

MemberSignature.Value: public DispatchOperation (System.ServiceModel.Dispatcher.DispatchRuntime parent, string name, string action, string replyAction);

span.span: The associated object.
The name of the dispatch operation.

param.span: 正在为其创建调度操作的 SOAP 消息操作。

span.span: The SOAP message Action for which this dispatch operation is being created.

param.name: replyAction
param.span: 与此调度操作关联的回复操作。

span.span: The reply action associated with this dispatch operation.

summary.span: 使用指定的调用运行时、名称、操作以及回复操作值初始化 类的新实例。

span.span: Initializes a new instance of the class using the specified dispatch run-time, name, action, and reply action values.

remarks.format: ## Remarks 对于遵循请求-回复模式的服务操作，使用此构造函数。Use this constructor for a service operation that follows the request-reply pattern.

Attribute.AttributeName: get: System.Runtime.TargetedPatchingOptOut("Performance critical to inline this type of method across NGen image boundaries")

summary.span: 获取或设置是否自动释放参数。

span.span: Gets or sets whether parameters are to be automatically disposed.

value.span: 如果自动释放参数，则为 ；否则为 。

span.span: if the parameters are to be automatically disposed; otherwise .

remarks.format: ## Remarks 此属性确定服务是否释放在处理消息的过程中创建的所有 参数（输入、输出或引用参数）。This property determines whether the service disposes all parameters (input, output or reference parameters) that were created while processing a message. 默认值是 `true`。The default value is `true`. 将此属性设置为 `false` 可以阻止系统释放资源。Set this property to `false` to prevent the system from disposing resources. 在此情况下，您负责控制参数的生存期。In this case, you are responsible for the parameter lifetimes. 如果需要在操作完成时释放参数，请参见 事件。See the event if you need to dispose parameters when the operation completes.

MemberSignature.Value: Public ReadOnly Property CallContextInitializers As SynchronizedCollection(Of ICallContextInitializer)

Attribute.AttributeName: get: System.Runtime.TargetedPatchingOptOut("Performance critical to inline this type of method across NGen image boundaries")

summary.span: 定义方法的 对象的集合，通过这些方法，可以使用调用用户代码的线程来初始化和回收本地线程存储。

span.span: A collection of objects that defines the methods that enable the initialization and recycling of thread-local storage with the thread that invokes user code.

value.span: 对象的集合。

span.span: A collection of objects.

remarks.format: ## Remarks 使用 属性可以添加自定义 对象，这些对象向调用持续时间的调用上下文中添加状态，然后在完成调用之后返回消息之前检索它。Use the property to add custom objects that add state to the call context for the duration of the call and can retrieve it subsequent to the completion of the call but prior to returning the message.

value.span: 如果返回类型是 类型并且没有 out 参数，则为 ；否则为 。

span.span: if the return type is of type and there are no out parameters; otherwise, .

remarks.format: ## Remarks 使用 属性可以控制格式化程序是否反序列化从入站消息返回的值，或者是否将入站消息作为返回值直接返回。Use the property to control whether the formatter deserializes the return value from an inbound message or whether the inbound message is returned directly as the return value. - **注意**如果 `false`，则返回类型必须为 类型，并且不能有 out 参数或在运行时引发 。**Note** If `false`, the return type must be of type and there can be no out parameters or an is thrown at run-time.

summary.span: 获取或设置将消息反序列化到对象，以及将对象序列化到消息的格式化程序。

span.span: Gets or sets the formatter that deserializes messages into objects and serializes objects into messages.

value.span: 实现。

span.span: An implementation.

remarks.format: ## Remarks 使用 属性插入某一操作的自定义 实现或修改当前格式化程序。Use the property to insert a custom implementation for an operation or modify the current formatter. 对于强类型消息操作，可以通过 和 属性来对格式化程序的使用进行控制。In the case of strongly-typed message operations, the use of the formatter can be controlled by the and properties. 接口定义了 和 方法，这些方法用于分别将一组对象参数转换为消息和将消息转换为一组返回值。The interface defines the and methods, which are used to convert a set of object parameters to a message and from a message to a set of return values, respectively.

summary.span: 获取或设置 对象的集合，这些对象可以检查和修改特定代理方法的入站对象和出站对象。

span.span: Gets or sets a collection of objects that can inspect and modify inbound and outbound objects for a particular proxy method.

value.span: 实现的集合。

span.span: A collection of implementations.

remarks.format: ## Remarks 使用 属性插入自定义 实现或修改当前实现。Use the property to insert a custom implementation or to modify the current one. 对于请求，参数检查器是按它们添加到集合的顺序来调用的；对于回复，则按相反的顺序调用。Parameter inspectors are invoked in the order in which they are added to the collection for requests and in the reverse order for replies.

summary.span: 获取或设置一个值，该值指定 对象是否序列化回复消息。

span.span: if the property serializes the return values into a reply message; otherwise, .

remarks.format: ## Remarks 使用 属性可以指示格式化程序是否将操作参数序列化为回复消息，或者是否将第一个参数作为出站消息发送。Use the property to indicate whether the formatter serializes operation parameters into a reply message or whether the first parameter is sent as the outbound message. > [!NOTE] > 如果设置为 `false`，则该操作的返回值的类型必须为 ，否则将引发异常。If set to `false`, the return value of the operation must be of type or an exception is thrown.

span.span: Gets or sets a value that specifies whether the current transaction automatically completes when the operation returns successfully.

value.span: 如果在成功返回时自动完成操作，则为 ；否则为 。

span.span: if the operation automatically completes on successful return; otherwise, .

summary.span: 获取或设置一个值，该值指定是否必须在事务中执行操作。

span.span: Gets or sets a value that specifies whether the operation must execute within a transaction.

value.span: 如果必须在事务范围内执行操作，则为 ；否则为 。

span.span: if the operation must execute within the scope of a transaction; otherwise, .

value.span: 默认为 。

span.span: The default is .

remarks.format: ## Remarks 如果 `true` 属性，则 WCF 会将当前事务设置为用于接收消息的事务（如果使用事务传输传输）;如果消息具有事务，则为通过通道流动的事务;否则，调度程序将创建一个新的。If the property is `true`, WCF sets the current transaction to the transaction used to receive the message if using a transacted transport; or the transaction flowed over the channel if the message had a transaction; or the dispatcher will create a new one.
